message: I personally use Python (especially with scrapy.org - a "crawler framework") for writing crawlers and scrapers.
+1 for scrapy & python. mechanize can also be useful when you want more control.

I have been considering using a full message queue system rather than Scrapy. I would prefer to use 0MQ, but celery seems really full featured and uses RabbitMQ. I figure if that if I do that, create processing pipelines and distributing work between clients becomes easier.
